item.title: Tom Holland vs. Tom Holland Is Officially Happening In 2026 - And There's One Clear Winner
item.description: Tom Holland is about to go up against himself at the box office, and while Marvel and Nolan are both titans themselves, there is a clear frontrunner.

item.title: Michael Keaton's $8.7M Action Thriller Movie Becomes Netflix Global Hit 3 Years Later
item.description: Michael Keaton's action thriller that made only $8.7 million at the box office in 2021 becomes a global Netflix hit three years later.

item.title: Steven Spielberg Directed The Last Horror Movie To Hit A Major Box Office Milestone 49 Years Ago
item.description: Steven Spielberg's classic horror blockbuster Jaws became a major success that other horror movies have not been able to rival for 49 years.
